item.title: MIUI OS1.0.12.0.UMAMIXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi 13 Ultra Global
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi 13 Ultra Global

Codename: ishtar

Version: OS1.0.12.0.UMAMIXM | 14.0

Size: 7.9 GB

MD5: 3af3334dabcc344ef35d1a5a811da4f4

Changelog:
[System]
Updated the security patch to September 2024. Increased system security.
[Floating windows]
Fix: Video apps weren't displayed correctly when switching screen orientation
Fix: The size of pinned floating windows for some games was incorrect

Download: Here
